title: CMCH Vellore Jobs 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Technical Assistant, Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Christian Medical College and Hospital Vellore (CMCH Vellore) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Technical Assistant, Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Civil Engineering or any degree can apply for the CMCH Vellore Jobs 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned...
